steps.content: â€œRawrâ€ came about via mid-2000s internet emo culture. â€œRawrâ€ (often accompanied by the emoticon XD) became linked to teenagers in the emo and scene subcultures of the internet. Illustrations circulated online (especially on DeviantArt) of dinosaurs with the words â€œRawr! It means I love you in dinosaur.â€ [2] X Research source The term grew in popularity over the decades via viral posts like DeviantArt user SilentReaperâ€™s illustration of a dinosaur entitled â€œOMG RAWR XDâ€ in 2004, or Facebook user Bardock Obamaâ€™s 2015 status that read, â€œâ€˜Rawr XDâ€™ means â€˜Ima eat ya a**â€™ in dinosaur.â€ While the word was and is considered by some people to be a â€œcringeâ€ and infantile way to disguise authentic feelings under playfulness, itâ€™s also, paradoxically, reflective of emo and scene kidsâ€™ originality and rejection of social norms.

steps.content: Use â€œrawrâ€ to express affection or attraction for someone in a playful way. â€œRawrâ€ is a super fun and playful way to show you care about someone. Tl;dr, have fun with it! [3] X Research source Rawr! I havenâ€™t seen you in ages! Letâ€™s hang out! I rawr you so much! Rawr! Youâ€™re my best friend.

steps.content: Use â€œrawrâ€ to show affection without having to be direct and vulnerable. One of the great things about â€œrawrâ€ is that it shows you careâ€”but itâ€™s not as overt as saying, â€œIâ€™m madly in love with youâ€ or â€œI want your body.â€ Next time youâ€™re chatting with your crush and you want to tentatively take things up a notch, text them, â€œRawr!â€ and see how they respond. If they â€œrawrâ€ back? Itâ€™s kismet. If they say nothing? Well, maybe they just didnâ€™t get it. Rawr! What are you up to? Rawr XD! Iâ€™m so lonely without you! Come over! Rawr!

steps.title: "Rawr" is one of many fun and silly millennial slang words.
steps.content: "Rawr" is one of many fun and silly millennial slang words .
